titles.title: National Cheese Exchange Oversight and Improvement Act of 1997

To amend the Commodity Exchange Act to require the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to regulate certain cash markets, such as the National Cheese Exchange, until the Commission determines that the market does not establish reference points for other transactions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Risk Management and Specialty Crops.

bill.summary: 2/6/1997--Introduced. National Cheese Exchange Oversight and Improvement Act of 1997 - Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to direct the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to regulate a concentrated cash market (as defined by this Act), including the National Cheese Exchange in Green Bay, Wisconsin, until the Commission determines that the market is not functioning as a reference price for off-market transactions of the commodity being traded on such market.
